extension_name.message: Saladict, he Āhuatanga-Taonga Rōraina Translator. Chrome / Firefox Toronga.

extension_description.message: Saladict ko te ngaio kupu-translation toronga, i hanga mo te ripeka-te tai'oraa. Te reira i te maha nui o te mana papakupu te taupoki ana i te reo ingarihi, French, Japanese, me te pāniora, me te tautoko i te matatini tukatuka kupu, whārangi tukutuku translation, kupu i te pukapuka, me te PDF tirotiro.

command_open_quick_search.message: Tuwhera ranei te whakanui i tūkotahi dict te paewhiri

command_open_pdf.message: Tuwhera o nāianei i roto i te PDF Saladict

command_search_clipboard.message: Rapu papatopenga ihirangi i roto i te Standalone te Paewhiri
